functions.tag:
{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Hi sunt scriptae litterae ex decorum octo iterum rubrum.



           ▄█
        ▄███▄
     ▄███████▄
  ▄▄█████████▄
 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Latine scriptum est non Ordinarius oculus parium suorum, per multa arcana sapientiae lucrata est liber tam magnis animis in diebus praeteritis E = MC2 quarum una patet solutio ad industria.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Deinde, dum hominum genus incassum cognitione formarum simul inferre. Tandem tamen ad ultimum gradum quo nulla induxit prope hominem cadere.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Annorum fuit cum patribus familias ac fundavit eam tueri iuramentum ut invicem diligatis qui nunc contra communem hostem invicem pacifice viventes peccaverunt.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Si suus 'fere ut si vivere in a venereum poema medii aevi in saecula saeculorum. A era sed quamdiu quis in oblivione coram nobis et octo Providerant conditores ex diversitate Rubrum.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
Digni estis in fide scripturam legere, satis fidum super isto vitio ferre hostis iudicatus esset rubri.


Sit tibi anni vitare.
 \"}]"
                ],
                title:"Book of Red",
                author:"The Eight",
                display:{Lore:["This book seems to be very old and nicely decorated."]}
              }

{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"۩▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤۩
Guide of Easter Trials
۩▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤▤۩▤▤۩


  ┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼
    ▃▅▆▇▇▇▇▆▅▃
     ▐              ▐
     ▐              ▐
     ▐              ▐
     ▐              ▐
     ▐              ▐
  ┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼┼\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
§oThe first place you will
     visit is the Archaeologist's Hoard
   in which you will
 search till you find a
   sacred book. This
  sacred book will be
   used to find a
   sacred place.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"
§o   In namely sacred
   place you will find
       the book
  that rules over all
  other books. In this
  book you will find a
 clue that brings you
to a hidden spot with
a hidden room within a
     hidden room.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"

§oWithin this hidden room
you will find directions
   towards a hidden
   library that is not
entirely a library. This
     library will be
corrupted but not as
      a whole.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"

§o Here after cleansing
the corruption you will
 find the end that will
  bear the fruits of
      knowledge.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"Guide of Easter Trials",
                author:"Unknown",
                display:{Lore:["This book is one of two and a translation for the other."]}
              }

{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"
§7▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓§r
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶                 ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶ §l§4RatBeards§r ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶   §l§4Journal§r   ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶                 ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶                 ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶   §o§8A story§r     ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶  §o§8dedicated§r   ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶   §o§8to Natsu§r    ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶   §o§8The Rat§r     ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
〰§l§7⊏⊐§r▶                 ◀§l§7⊏⊐§r〰
§7▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Rats, rats everywhere, always. On the sea, on the shore.. While we're sleeping or awake. I uses to hate the pesky little things and I kind of still do but not entirely. They would still swarm around, eat our food or end up as. But not my Natsu, no.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"The brave little screamer as he is wouldn't end up in the pot. You see, there are rats and well.. rats. This one wasn't like the other fatty little biters. He would scream, jump and run around but never bite me.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"This all didn't just happened overnight though. It was a night of horrors in which our ship flipped itself around as if it was a coin flipped by the gods themselves. The same night or the next I woke up on a beach and started searching for other survivors.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Not even a dead body. All I could find were some loose boards. To make matters even worse I couldn't use my right arm. Broken was my guess.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"And so I started searching for a sign of life up ahead the shoreline only to be met by not only sheer cliffs at front but at back and land inwards too. I would need my arm to heal properly before I
could go any further.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Days passed until my little Natsu made his first appearance as he tried to steal some of my fish. I attempted to catch him as he would make a nice change for dinner but I failed. In the following weeks he
started returning on regular basis,\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"noticeably losing weight with every return.

For his endurance I applauded him and tossed him a piece of fish. The next day I grabbed my coconut filled with water, my bag full of smoked fish and embarked on my journey.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Hours passed as i climbed the steep cliffs until i reached the top where I was faced with a most dreadful sight. Appears I stranded on a island. Knowing however we sailed close to the shore I know mainland shouldn't be far.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"In fact after close inspection of the horizon I saw mountains in the distance and thus regained hope.
On my way down I realized it was going to take a long, long time as I would need to make a raft and for a raft I would need to make rope and so on.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Back at where I left I was met with a curious sight. The little Rat, little as he lost a lot of weight was standing right there on two legs with one of his paws directed towards me and the other hanging next to his lean body.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"This was the moment I decided I could use some company for the journey ahead and threw him a piece of my smoked fish.

 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Another week passed and the rat which I now named Natsu for his weird energetic, loud but tender behavior had gained some weight back. After cleaning him under a lot of protest his fur revealed
to not just be a brownish color but instead a mix with white flanks.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"In the following weeks I was again and again surprised on how clean and smart the little creature actually was. he would wash himself completely up to 3 times a day. Haven't seen anyone take a bath more then 2 times a day.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Being as clean as that is just one thing when it comes to Natsu as like the little jumper he is he managed to catch a bloody seagull. It tasted like shit but is definitely commendable!\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Since the day I had stranded a lot of moons have passed the nightly sky but at last we were ready to embark on our journey which ironically enough lasted us only 2 days before we stranded at the other side
were we magically met with our fellow pirates building our new ship.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It is Natsu who helped me through the rough times on that beach and still is of immeasurable worth to me as Natsu the rat is more of a friend then any treasure could ever be.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"RatBeards Journal",
                author:"RatBeards",
                display:{Lore:["A book dedicated to a very special rat named Natsu."]}
              }
